Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - KUĆA S 3 APARTMANA i PARKING - PIROVAC 600m od MORA! Prodajemo dvojnu kuću ukupne površine 194,76m2 u Pirovcu, s 3 apartmana. Kuća se nalazi u mirnoj ulici, ispod glavne prometnice. Od prve plaže udaljena je 10min pješice a od centra mjesta 15min. Sastoji se od prizemlja, prvoga kata i potkrovlja. U prizemlju se nalazi apartman stambene površine 59,01m2 koji se sastoji od kuhinje i blagovaonice, dnevnog boravka, hodnika, kupaonice i jedne spavaće sobe. Pripada mu premište i loggia. Ukupna površina prizemlja sa svim pripatcima iznosi 69,73m2. Osim klime, u prizemlju je postavljena i peć na pelet. Iz kuhinje i blagovaonice je izlazi na terasu i u dvorište kuće u kojem se nalazi roštilj i vanjska kuhinja. Prizemlje je povezano unutarnjim stepeništem kojim se dolazi do prvoga kata i potkrovlja. Na prvom katu nalazi se apartman stambene površine 63,71m2 koji se sastoji od hodnika, jedne spavaće sobe, kupaonice, dnevnog boravka/sobe i kuhinje. Iz dnevnog boravka se izlazi na terasu. Ukupna površina stana s terasom iznosi 66,01m2. U potkrovlju je stan stambene površine 56,23m2 te se sastoji od kuhinje, kupaonice, sobe/dnevnog boravka s izlazom na terasu. Ukupna površina stana s terasom iznosi 59,02m2 Prvi kat i potkrovlje imaju i odvojen ulaz s druge strane kuće, s glavne ceste, tako da je omogućena kompletna privatnost. U dvorištu kuće je parking. Kuća je kompletno adaptirana prije 6 godina. Krov je renoviran prije 10 godina. Spojena je na septičku jamu a instalacija za kanalizaciju je pripremljena i provedena. Vlasništvo 1/1 ! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar SALE - HOUSE WITH 3 APARTMENT UNITS AND PARKING - PIROVAC 600m FROM THE SEA! We are selling a duplex house with a total area of ​​194.76m2 in Pirovac, with 3 apartments. The house is located in a quiet area, under the main road. It is a 10 minute walking distance from the first beach and 15 minutes from the city center. It consists of the ground floor, first floor and attic. On the ground floor there is an apartment with a living area of ​​59.01m2, which consists of a kitchen and dining room, living room, hallway, bathroom and one bedroom. The apartment also has a storage and loggia. The total area of ​​the ground floor with all accessories is 69.73m2. From the kitchen and dining room there is access to the terrace and the yard of the house with a barbecue and an outdoor kitchen. The ground floor is connected to the first floor and the attic by an internal staircase. On the first floor there is an apartment with a living area of ​​63.71m2, which consists of a hallway, one bedroom, bathroom, living room/bedroom and kitchen. From the living room there is access to the terrace. The total area of ​​the apartment with a terrace is 66.01 m2. The attic consists of an apartment with a living area of ​​56.23m2 and consists of a kitchen, bathroom, bedroom/living room with access to the terrace. The total area of ​​the apartment with a terrace is 59.02m2. The first floor and the attic have a separate entrance from the other side of the house, from the main road, so that complete privacy is provided. There is a parking lot in the yard of the house. The house was completely renovated 6 years ago. The roof was renovated 10 years ago. It is connected to the septic tank. The sewage installation has been prepared and implemented. Ownership 1/1 ! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
